Module fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant
Package fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.dao.accommodationAlert

Class AccommodationAlertDAO

java.lang.Object
fr.umontpellier.polytech.ig.colocalternant.dao.accommodationAlert.AccommodationAlertDAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccommodationAlertDAOSQLite
public abstract class AccommodationAlertDAO extends Object
AccommodationAlertDAO is an abstract class providing methods to interact with the database for managing Accommodation entities.

  • Method Details

    • insertAccommodationAlert

      public void insertAccommodationAlert (int profileID, String location, float surface, float minPrice, float maxPrice)
      Inserts an accommodationAlert into the database.
      Parameters:
      profileID - The ID of the profile.
      location - The location of the accommodation.
      surface - The surface of the accommodation.
      minPrice - The minimum price of the accommodation.
      maxPrice - The maximum price of the accommodation.

    • getAllAccommodationAlert

      public ArrayList<AccommodationAlert> getAllAccommodationAlert()
      Retrieve all accommodationAlerts from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all accommodationAlerts.

    • getOwnAccommodationAlerts

      public ArrayList<AccommodationAlert> getOwnAccommodationAlerts (int profileID)
      Retrieves the AccommodationAlert owned by a specific profile from the database.
      Parameters:
      profileID - The profile for whom to retrieve the AccommodationAlerts.
      Returns:
      List of AccommodationAlerts owned by the profile.

    • getAccommodationAlertByID

      public AccommodationAlert getAccommodationAlertByID (int id)
      Retrieve a specific accommodationAlert from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the accommodationAlert to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The accommodationAlert with the specified ID.

    • updateAccommodationAlert

      public void updateAccommodationAlert (int id, int profileID, String location, float surface, float minPrice, float maxPrice)
      Update an existing accommodationAlert in the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the accommodation.
      profileID - The ID of the profile.
      location - The location of the accommodation.
      surface - The surface of the accommodation.
      minPrice - The minimum price of the accommodation.
      maxPrice - The maximum price of the accommodation.

    • deleteAccommodationAlert

      public void deleteAccommodationAlert (int id)
      Delete an accommodationAlert from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the accommodationAlert to be deleted.
